content:
# The execution result indicates an error occurred while attempting to craft a stone furnace. The error message states that I cannot craft the stone furnace because I need to gather the intermediate resource, which is stone.

# Since I currently have iron ore but no stone, I need to gather stone first. 
# I will locate a nearby stone resource to collect the necessary materials.

# Finding the nearest stone resource
nearest_stone_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)
move_to(nearest_stone_position)  # Moving to the location of the nearest stone resource.
